LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaTurret.label: ballista bolt
LanguageData.DarkLandMinez.label: dark landmine rune
LanguageData.DarkLandMinez.description: An anti-personel land mine made of dark essence. Can disappear over time.
LanguageData.Gun_Ballista.label: ballista turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_Ballista.description: A simple automatic ballista made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_Ballista.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: ballista turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_Dummy_Blunderbuss.label: blunderbuss turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_Dummy_Blunderbuss.description: A simple blunderbuss weapon made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_Randy.label: Randy Random turret dummy
LanguageData.Turret_Randy.description: A dummy of the most annoying storyteller in existence. Can disappear over time.
LanguageData.Turret_SelfPoweredBallistaTurret.label: self-powered ballista turret
LanguageData.Turret_SelfPoweredBallistaTurret.descrip: An ancient ballista turret. Appears to be dwarven in nature and design. Can disappear over time.
